scripts.ci-all: npm ci && cd projects/$2sxc && npm ci && cd ../.. && cd projects/inpage && npm ci && cd ../.. && cd projects/code-editor-snippets && npm ci && cd ../.. && cd projects/quick-dialog && npm ci && cd ../.. && cd projects/cms && npm ci && cd ../.. && cd projects/turnOn && npm ci && cd ../..
scripts.release-all: npm run js2sxc && npm run inpage && npm run snippets && npm run quickdialog && npm run cms && npm run turn-on
scripts.js2sxc: cd projects/$2sxc && npm run release && cd ../..
scripts.inpage: cd projects/inpage && npm run release && cd ../..
scripts.snippets: cd projects/code-editor-snippets && npm run gulp  && cd ../..
scripts.quickdialog: cd projects/quick-dialog && npm run release && cd ../..
scripts.cms: cd projects/cms && npm run release && cd ../..
scripts.turn-on: cd projects/turnOn && npm run release && cd ../..
